PHRASE.LANG: Decorate your home with this Tauntaun bust. These creatures were used by the Rebels as patrol mounts on Hoth because their own vehicles were unreliable in the extremely cold climate. They evidently smell really bad.[#Legal]

Décorez votre intérieur avec ce buste Tauntaun. Ces créatures étaient utilisées par les Rebelles en tant que montures pour les patrouilles sur Hoth en raison du manque de fiabilité de leurs véhicules sous un climat extrêmement froid. Leur odeur est évidemment atroce.[#Legal]

Dekoriere dein Heim mit dieser Tauntaunbüste. Diese Kreaturen wurden auf Hoth von den Rebellen als Reittiere eingesetzt, weil deren eigene Transportmittel in dem extrem kalten Klima zu oft versagten. Sie riechen offenkundig recht streng.[#Legal]

Decora la tua casa con questo busto di Tauntaun. Queste creature venivano usate dai Ribelli per andare in pattuglia sul pianeta Hoth, dal momento che i loro veicoli erano poco affidabili in quel clima polare. A quanto pare, i Tauntaun puzzano molt.[#Legal]

Decora tu hogar con este busto de Tauntaun. Estas criaturas fueron usadas por los Rebeldes como patrullas montadas en Hoth porque sus propios vehículos eran poco fiables en el clima extremamente frío. Evidentemente, huelen muy mal.[#Legal]

Decorate your home with this Tauntaun bust. These creatures were used by the Rebels as patrol mounts on Hoth because their own vehicles were unreliable in the extremely cold climate. They evidently smell really bad.[#Legal]

Decorate your home with this Tauntaun bust. These creatures were used by the Rebels as patrol mounts on Hoth because their own vehicles were unreliable in the extremely cold climate. They evidently smell really bad.[#Legal]
